field.label: Affiliation
field.hint: Enter the affiliation of the author as stated on the publication

field.label: Author
field.hint: The authors of this publication

field.label: Editor
field.hint: The editors of this publication

field.label: Title
field.hint: The title of the publication

field.label: Subtitle
field.hint: The subtitle of the publication

field.label: Publication Date
field.hint: The issue of the publishing channel where this publication appeared. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The publishers of this publication

field.label: Published In
field.hint: The source (another Publication) where this publication appeared. E.g. a journal article lists here the journal where it appeared. To be used for a publishing channel.

field.label: Part Of
field.hint: The Publication of which this publication is a part. E.g. a book chapter lists here the book that contains it. To be used for a containing publication

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.required: You must select a publisher type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the publication. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the publication.

field.label: Subject
field.hint: The subject of the publication from a classification

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: A single keyword or key expression. Please repeat to serialize separate keywords or key expressions.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Number
field.hint: The number of the publication (e.g. Article Number)

field.label: Volume
field.hint: The volume of the publishing channel where this publication appeared

field.label: Edition
field.hint: The edition of the publication

field.label: Start Page
field.hint: The page where this publication starts, in case the publishing channel or containing publication has numbered pages

field.label: End Page
field.hint: The page where this publication ends, in case the publishing channel or containing publication has numbered pages

field.label: Status
field.hint: The publication status.

field.label: Originates From
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this publication.

field.label: Presented At
field.hint: The event where this publication was presented.

field.label: Output From
field.hint: This publication contains the proceedings from the linked event

field.label: Coverage
field.hint: The event that is covered by this publication (e.g. a report about the event)

field.label: References
field.hint: Result outputs that are referenced by this publication

field.label: Access
field.hint: The open access type of the publication

field.label: Creator
field.hint: The creators of this product

field.label: Name
field.hint: The name of the product

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The publisher or publishers of this product

field.label: Part Of
field.hint: Link to the research output of which this product is a part (e.g. a data set collection that contains it)

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.required: You must select a product type
field.hint: The type of the resulting product (other than publication or patent)

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language used.

field.label: Subject
field.hint: The subject of the product from a classification

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: A single keyword or key expression. Please repeat to serialize separate keywords or key expressions.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the product.

field.label: Version
field.hint: The number of the publication (e.g. Article Number)

field.label: Originates From
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this product.

field.label: Presented At
field.hint: The event where this product was presented

field.label: Generated by
field.hint: The equipment that generated this product

field.label: Coverage
field.hint: The event that is covered by this product (e.g. a video or audio interview about the event)

field.label: References
field.hint: Result outputs that are referenced by this product

field.label: Access
field.hint: The open access type of the publication

field.label: Inventor
field.hint: The inventor: The actual devisor of an invention that is the subject of a patent.

field.label: Title
field.hint: The title of the patent

field.label: Holder
field.hint: The holders of this patent

field.label: Approval Date
field.hint: The Approval date. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Registration Date
field.hint: The registration date of the patent. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Issuer
field.hint: The issuer of the patent: the patent office

field.label: PatentNumber
field.hint: The patent number.

field.label: Type
field.required: You must select a patent type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the patent.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the country and its language.

field.label: Subject
field.hint: The subject of the product from a classification

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: A single keyword or key expression. Please repeat to serialize separate keywords or key expressions.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the description of the patent.

field.label: Originates From
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this patent.

field.label: Predecessor
field.hint: Patents that precede (i.e., have priority over) this patent

field.label: References
field.hint: Result outputs that are referenced by this patent

pair.displayed-value: FYRO Macedonian (Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia)
